title: 820-00281 can't boot into external. Can't recognize devices for the 1st 5 mins after booting
message:
replaced all USB controllers. there seems to be some sort of delay with data connections to USB C. for the first 5 mins after the OS boots it doesn't react with external devices (but is able to charge) after 5 mins it's perfectly normal

When trying to boot into external drive, it fails halfway through and is unable to boot

title: 820-00281 can't boot into external. Can't recognize devices for the 1st 5 mins after booting
820-00281 can't boot into external. Can't recognize devices for the 1st 5 mins after booting
message: no faults, no water. very clean and spotless. This just started happening

title: 820-00281 can't boot into external. Can't recognize devices for the 1st 5 mins after booting
message:
Do you get correct 5V at L3500 and/or LB700 in the first 5 minutes?
Check with some USB device connected.
